title: Steel mace

properties.value: The steel mace is a mace stronger than the iron mace, requiring 5 Attack to wield. Players can make it with the Smithing skill at level 32 using one steel bar, giving 37.5 Smithing experience.

Item ID1424

The steel mace is a mace stronger than the iron mace, requiring 5 Attack to wield. Players can make it with the Smithing skill at level 32 using one steel bar, giving 37.5 Smithing experience.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The mace's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).
